AD_MODULE.UPDATEINFO: Fixed issues: 30841: Return line button should not be clickable if the selected line is a Gift Card 31565: [Multiserver] We need to enable multiserver for all modules 31700: [HGVOL] gift card module with new entities increases line qty but does not add gift card to ticket 31651: Gift Card Instance transactions are not properly created with returns 31949: [HGVOL] Unnecessary queries are done when search a gift card
